The Hogarth Press encloses the contract Virginia Woolf signed with The Hogarth Press for Orlando: A Biography.
Typescript letter [illegible signature]
-
-
-
-
-
London
-
23rd April, 1952.
-
-
Christopher Mann Management Ltd
-
140, Park Lane, London. W. I.
-
Dear Mrs. Roberts,
-
I understand from Mr. Woolf that he promised to let you see the contrast between the late Mrs. Woolf and The Hogarth Press for Orlando, which I have much pleasure in enclosing with this letter. As this is an original, perhaps you could let us have it back as soon as you have finished with it.
-
-
Yours sincerely,
